price: 59. Diggah tama korosuy isi nafsi Nabii Mucammad dirabbossaamat tudlume, keenik naharat sugte ken kataysis (koros kinnuk) digaalâ geyte maglabih innah yan maglab Ion digaalak, usun tokkel yi digaalat qataatake woonay (assexeere woonay) is keenih amaatelem raq malik.
arabic: فَإِنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ ذَنُوبٗا مِّثۡلَ ذَنُوبِ أَصۡحَٰبِهِمۡ فَلَا يَسۡتَعۡجِلُونِ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: fa-inna lilladhīna ẓalamū dhanūban mith'la dhanūbi aṣḥābihim falā yastaʿjilūni
translations: so let them not ask Me to hasten
so let them not ask Me to hasten
